Welcome to atomic_ratio_parser's documentation!
===============================================

This **Python** module provides :py:func:`atomic_ratio_parser.parse_atomic_ratio` function to parse atomic ratios from a chemical formula.

Requirements:
Python>=3.7

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   atomic_ratio_parser

|release|
